Package edu.hm.dako.chatclient

Class AbstractChatClient

java.lang.Object
edu.hm.dako.chatclient.AbstractChatClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientCommunication
Direct Known Subclasses:
BenchmarkingClientImpl, ClientImpl
public abstract class AbstractChatClient extends Object implements ClientCommunication
Gemeinsame Funktionalitaet fuer alle Client-Implementierungen.
